explains: n. 看法，认识；感觉，感知；洞察力；<法律>（租金、农作物等的）收取，占有
wordGroup: visual perception 视觉感知；视知觉
aesthetic perception 美感，审美观念；审美知觉
sensory perception n. 感官知觉
perception and understanding 感知与理解

sentences.en: She showed great perception in her assessment of the family situation.
sentences.cn: 她对家庭状况的分析显示出敏锐的洞察力。

sentences.en: It did not require a lot of perception to realize the interview was over.
sentences.cn: 不需要很强的洞察力就可以意识到面试结束了。
感知是打破传统的核心。
